structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: Short title for KRS 164.948 to 164.9489 and KRS 164.993.
law.text: KRS 164.948 to 164.9489 and KRS 164.993 may be cited as the Michael Minger Life Safety Act.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 190, sec. 7, effective July 14, 2000.
